oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of battles in which the 20th Ohio Vol. Inf. was engaged
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written by Sgt. Henry V. Wilson, this 2-column list of battles--from Fort Donelson and Shiloh in Tennessee to Raleigh and Durham Station in North Carolina--engaged in by his unit "under Generals Grant and Sherman during the great Rebellion of 1861-1865." Written on the back of a blank NCO appointment form.
